definition: of or pertaining to or contained in or in accordance with the Bible
details:
adjective
- of or pertaining to or contained in or in accordance with the Bible
= example: of or pertaining to or contained in or in accordance with the Bible
= synonyms: scriptural
- in keeping with the nature of the Bible or its times or people
= example: in keeping with the nature of the Bible or its times or people
- epic or extremely notable
= example: epic or extremely notable
